briefdescription.para: This validator checks a DL_TTI,request message.
This validator checks the SSB PDU.
Validates the PCI property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4.
Validates the Beta PSS profine NR property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4.
Validates the block index property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4.
Validates the subcarrier offset property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4.
Validates the offset point A property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the DMRS type A position property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table PHY MIB.
Validates the case property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table SSB/PBCH PDU maintenance FAPIv3.
Validates the subcarrier spacing property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table SSB/PBCH PDU maintenance FAPIv3.
Validates the baseband power scaling for SS-PBCH property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table SSB/PBCH PDU maintenance FAPIv3.
Validates the beta PSS profile SSS property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table SSB/PBCH PDU maintenance FAPIv3.
Validates the LMax property of the SSB PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2.4 in table SSB/PBCH PDU maintenance FAPIv3.
